[vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1605938723972{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}” el_class=”services-top-text-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”30″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Custom Tailoring For Women[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text el_class=”padding-right-xl-100 padding-right-xs-100″ css=”.vc_custom_1605940162132{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”]We provide doorstep services for all kind of lady dresses, either it is daily office wear or special occasion wear. It is very safe and reliable, as you will not have to track your order and visit shops.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”cus-book-app” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1606814381124{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1518720012941{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Book An

Appointment

Upon receiving your booking request, we will contact you within 24 hours to confirm your details and to find a suitable time for your fitting.[/vc_column_text][mk_button dimension=”flat” corner_style=”full_rounded” size=”medium” icon=”mk-li-calendar” icon_anim=”side” url=”https://tailorjunction.com/book-an-appointment/” align=”none” margin_top=”20″ bg_color=”#cfb151″ btn_hover_bg=”rgba(207,177,81,0.8)”]Book An Appointment[/mk_button][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”tj-pricing-table-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”30″ font_family=”none” align=”center” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Pricing[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1605940125586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
Simple kurti without lining 550 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple kurti with lining 900 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit without lining 700 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit with kurti lining 850 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple salwar suit with full lining 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit without lining 950 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit with half lining 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple pant suit with full lining 1500 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple blouse 650 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple blouse with lining 750 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple skirt umbrella cut 1200 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple anarkali dress 2500 Rs Book an Appointment
Simple lehenga choli 3500 Rs Book an Appointment
Saree fall pico 350 Rs Book an Appointment
[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider size=”70″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1603646250074{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}” el_class=”custom_newsletter”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Signup For Our Newsletter[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515965544216{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Sign up to our newsletter and we’ll keep you up to date with the latest arrivals and offers[/vc_column_text][mk_subscribe button_text=”Subscribe” btn_bg_color=”#cfb151″ input_placeholder_color=”” btn_hover_bg_color=”rgba(207,177,81,0.8)”][mk_padding_divider size=”22″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
